channel.title: 美联社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪美联社news的种子

item.title: 动物学家证实，纽约市的名人猫头鹰弗拉科死于创伤性撞击，据报道它在飞入一栋大楼一天后死亡。目前正计划对这只欧亚鹰鸮进行进一步检测，以确定它是否生病。
item.description:
New York City’s celebrity owl Flaco died from a traumatic impact, zoologists confirmed, a day after he reportedly flew into a building. There is further testing planned to determine if the Eurasian eagle-owl may have been sick. pic.twitter.com/EEUy6OdZhO

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 温迪-威廉姆斯（Wendy Williams）纪录片制作人称，他们在拍摄大部分场景时并不知道她患有痴呆症
item.description:

item.title: 自从费城飞人队和渥太华参议员队以一场充满斗殴的比赛打破了国家冰球联盟的罚球时间记录以来，20 年过去了，冰球比赛中的斗殴事件已经很少发生，但并没有消失。
item.description:
Twenty years since the Philadelphia Flyers and Ottawa Senators broke the NHL record for penalty minutes with their brawl-filled game, fighting has evolved in hockey to the point of being rare but not gone. https://t.co/LGwYglZ9XP pic.twitter.com/7AaFz63oxV

— AP Sports (@AP_Sports) February 27, 2024

item.title: 温迪-威廉姆斯在哪里》的制片人为这部纪录片的发行辩护。在她的护理团队发表声明称她被诊断出患有原发性进行性失语症和额颞叶痴呆症两天后，这部纪录片首次亮相。
item.description:
Producers of "Where is Wendy Williams" defend releasing the documentary. The doc debuted two days after her care team released a statement saying she has been diagnosed with primary progressive aphasia and frontotemporal dementia. pic.twitter.com/hvso6uNiZN

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 27, 2024
